==Useful Info==
'''Ijyb, the Twisted Goblin''' is a particularly durable [[goblin]] who generates somewhat early on. She always spawns with a [[wand]], which makes her substantially more dangerous than regular goblins.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:3-5

==Tips & Tricks==
*Ijyb is an exception to the rule stating low-level monsters cannot spawn with powerful wands. Expect to see anything from a [[wand of polymorph]] to [[wand of paralysis|paralysis]] to even [[wand of acid|acid]].
*Just treat her like any other particularly well-armed goblin. Lure her into melee by hiding behind a corner, and fight her alone, so that other enemies can't surround you when you're paralyzed or polymorphed into a [[bad form]] by her wand.
*She has terrible [[willpower]]. Consider hitting her with a hex or your own [[wand of paralysis]] before going in for the kill.

==History==
*Before [[0.20]], Ijyb spawned earlier in the dungeon and did not always spawn with a wand.
*Ijyb was male before [[0.19]].
